name: Buck
text: <in n~a$a>o nunaz~ilo Ealayohim m~ina {ls~amaA^'i 'aAyapF faZal~ato >aEona`quhumo lahaA xa`DiEiyna

name: Buck
text: wamaA ya>otiyhim m~in *ikorK m~ina {lr~aHoma`ni muHodavK <il~aA kaAnuwA@ Eanohu muEoriDiyna

name: Buck
text: faqado ka*~abuwA@ fasaya>otiyhimo >an[ba`^&uA@ maA kaAnuwA@ bihi. yasotahozi'uwna

name: Buck
text: >awalamo yarawoA@ <ilaY {lo>aroDi kamo >an[batonaA fiyhaA min kul~i zawojK kariymK

name: Buck
text: wayaDiyqu SadoriY walaA yanTaliqu lisaAniY fa>arosilo <ilaY` ha`ruwna

name: Buck
text: qaAla kal~aA fa{*ohabaA bi_#aAya`tinaA^ <in~aA maEakum m~usotamiEuwna

name: Buck
text: qaAla >alamo nurab~ika fiynaA waliydFA walabivota fiynaA mino Eumurika siniyna

name: Buck
text: fafararotu minkumo lam~aA xifotukumo fawahaba liY rab~iY HukomFA wajaEalaniY mina {lomurosaliyna

name: Buck
text: watiloka niEomapN tamun~uhaA EalaY~a >ano Eab~adt~a baniY^ <isora`^'iyla

name: Buck
text: qaAla rab~u {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDi wamaA bayonahumaA^ <in kuntum m~uwqiniyna

name: Buck
text: qaAla rab~u {loma$oriqi wa{lomagoribi wamaA bayonahumaA^ <in kuntumo taEoqiluwna

name: Buck
text: fa>aloqaY` EaSaAhu fa<i*aA hiYa vuEobaAnN m~ubiynN

name: Buck
text: wanazaEa yadahu, fa<i*aA hiYa bayoDaA^'u liln~a`Ziriyna

name: Buck
text: qaAla lilomala<i Hawolahu,^ <in~a ha`*aA lasa`HirN EaliymN

name: Buck
text: yuriydu >an yuxorijakum m~ino >aroDikum bisiHorihi. famaA*aA ta>omuruwna

name: Buck
text: falam~aA jaA^'a {ls~aHarapu qaAluwA@ lifiroEawona >a}in~a lanaA la>ajorFA <in kun~aA naHonu {loga`libiyna

name: Buck
text: fa>aloqawoA@ HibaAlahumo waEiSiy~ahumo waqaAluwA@ biEiz~api firoEawona <in~aA lanaHonu {loga`libuwna

name: Buck
text: fa>aloqaY` muwsaY` EaSaAhu fa<i*aA hiYa taloqafu maA ya>ofikuwna

name: Buck
text: qaAla 'aAmantumo lahu, qabola >ano 'aA*ana lakumo <in~ahu, lakabiyrukumu {l~a*iY Eal~amakumu {ls~iHora falasawofa taEolamuwna la>uqaT~iEan~a >ayodiyakumo wa>arojulakum m~ino xila`fK wala>uSal~iban~akumo >ajomaEiyna

name: Buck
text: <in~aA naTomaEu >an yagofira lanaA rab~unaA xaTa`ya`naA^ >an kun~aA^ >aw~ala {lomu&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: fa>awoHayonaA^ <ilaY` muwsaY`^ >ani {Dorib b~iEaSaAka {lobaHora fa{nfalaqa fakaAna kul~u firoqK ka{lT~awodi {loEaZiymi

name: Buck
text: rab~i habo liY HukomFA wa>aloHiqoniY bi{lS~a`liHiyna

name: Buck
text: yawoma laA yanfaEu maAlN walaA banuwna

name: Buck
text: qaAla wamaA EilomiY bimaA kaAnuwA@ yaEomaluwna

name: Buck
text: qaAluwA@ la}in l~amo tantahi ya`nuwHu latakuwnan~a mina {lomarojuwmiyna

name: Buck
text: fa{fotaHo bayoniY wabayonahumo fatoHFA wanaj~iniY waman m~aEiYa mina {lomu&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: qaAluwA@ sawaA^'N EalayonaA^ >awaEaZota >amo lamo takun m~ina {lowa`EiZiyna

name: Buck
text: faka*~abuwhu fa>aholakona`humo <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAyapF wamaA kaAna >akovaruhum m~u&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: maA^ >anta <il~aA ba$arN m~ivolunaA fa>oti bi_#aAyapK <in kunta mina {lS~a`diqiyna

name: Buck
text: qaAla ha`*ihi. naAqapN l~ahaA $irobN walakumo $irobu yawomK m~aEoluwmK

name: Buck
text: walaA tamas~uwhaA bisuw^'K faya>oxu*akumo Ea*aAbu yawomK EaZiymK

name: Buck
text: fa>axa*ahumu {loEa*aAbu <in~a fiY *a`lika la'aAyapF wamaA kaAna >akovaruhum m~u&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: wata*aruwna maA xalaqa lakumo rab~ukum m~ino >azowa`jikum balo >antumo qawomN EaAduwna

name: Buck
text: qaAluwA@ la}in l~amo tantahi ya`luwTu latakuwnan~a mina {lomuxorajiyna

name: Buck
text: walaA taboxasuwA@ {ln~aAsa >a$oyaA^'ahumo walaA taEovawoA@ fiY {lo>aroDi mufosidiyna

name: Buck
text: wamaA^ >anta <il~aA ba$arN m~ivolunaA wa<in n~aZun~uka lamina {loka`*ibiyna

name: Buck
text: fa>asoqiTo EalayonaA kisafFA m~ina {ls~amaA^'i <in kunta mina {lS~a`diqiyna

name: Buck
text: faka*~abuwhu fa>axa*ahumo Ea*aAbu yawomi {lZ~ul~api <in~ahu, kaAna Ea*aAba yawomK EaZiymK

name: Buck
text: faqara>ahu, Ealayohim m~aA kaAnuwA@ bihi. mu&ominiyna

name: Buck
text: fa<ino EaSawoka faqulo <in~iY bariY^'N m~im~aA taEomaluwna

name: Buck
text: <il~aA {l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti wa*akaruwA@ {ll~aha kaviyrFA wa{ntaSaruwA@ min[ baEodi maA ZulimuwA@ wasayaEolamu {l~a*iyna Zalamuw^A@ >aY~a munqalabK yanqalibuwna
